text: Nicole Francine Aiello (born June 9, 1983) is an American R&B; singer- songwriter and model known by her stage name, Frankee. She grew up with her parents, Matthew and Francine, and her two siblings, elder brother Matthew Jr. and younger sister Monique. Nicole was given the nickname "Frankee," which came from her middle name (and is also her grandfather's nickname).Frankee's MySpace page She is best known for her debut single "F.U.R.B. (Fuck You Right Back)" which is a answer back to fellow American R&B; singer-songwriter Eamons debut single "Fuck It (I Don't Want You Back)". ==Career== "F.U.R.B. (Fuck You Right Back)" reached number one in the United Kingdom in May 2004, and Australia in June 2004. She then released her debut studio album later on that year. She then left her label in 2006 and signed with Big Management"Frankee - Watch Me download on Yahoo! Music - which shows record label" . yahoo.com. She has also modelled for FHM and Maxim magazines. ==Discography== ===Albums=== *2004: The Good, The Bad, The Ugly *2006: Watch Me (shelved) ===Singles=== Year Title Peak chart positions Album US US R&B; UK AUS DEN FRA NLD NZ NOR SWEDutch Charts - Frankee Chart discography in various countries 2004 "F.U.R.B.
